Traits.Name: Terrifying Presence
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the Beast of Gévaudan must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Keen Senses
Traits.Content: The Beast of Gévaudan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Beast of Gévaudan makes two Bite attacks.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (7d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Terrifying Howl (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Beast of Gévaudan unleashes a fearsome howl. Each creature within 60 feet that can hear it must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw, taking 30 (6d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save is also frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Blood Frenzy
Actions.Content: The Beast of Gévaudan charges at a creature it has damaged within the last turn. It makes a Bite attack against the creature. On a hit, the target takes an additional 20 (4d8) necrotic damage and gains one level of exhaustion.
